sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词或短语动词都含有"处理，对付"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: deal with, cope with, dispose of, manage, handle
means: deal with ： 既可指处理具体事情，也可指处理或解决具有抽象意义的问题。
cope with ： 指成功地处理或对付更为重大，更为严重的问题或事物。
dispose of与deal with同义，普通用法。
manage ： 指处理日常事务与工作，也可指经营管理。
handle ： 从原义"手柄"，转引申为作"处理"解时，其内涵是管理和操纵。

sentence.Network_en: The public never had faith in his ability to handle the job.
sentence.Network_cn: 公众从来不相信他有能力胜任这一职位。

sentence.Network_en: Our plan is to allocate one member of staff to handle appoint-ments.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的计划是分派一位职员处理预约事宜。

sentence.Network_en: Don't take on more responsibilities than you can handle.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 句柄图形就是将一个图形的每一个组件都是做一个对象， 每一个对象都有独一无二的句柄（Handle） ，句柄是该图形对象的唯一标识。

lj.lj_ly: I was finally able to get a handle on the true nature of the problem.
lj.lj_ls: 最终我能够理解这个问题的实质

phrase.cizu_name: get a handle on 或 have a handle on 【非正式用语】

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English handle (noun), handlian (verb), from hand

encyclopedia.content: HANDLE:句柄，是Windows用来表示对象的（不是C++的对象），HWND是其中一种，HWND是HANDLE,但HANDLE不只是HWND,更具体的查MSDN吧。 HANDLE锛埦浔級是windows操作系统中的一个概念。在window程序中，有各种各样的资源（窗口、图标、光标等），系统在创建这些资源时会为它们分配内存，并返回标示这些资源的标示号，即句柄。句柄指的是一个核心对象在某一个进程中的唯一索引，而不是指针。由于地址空间的限制，句柄所标识的内容对进

entry.def: A handle is a small round object or a lever that is attached to a door and is used for opening and closing it.

example.ex: I turned the handle and found the door was open.
example.tran: 我转了一下门把手，发现门开着。

entry.def: A handle is the part of an object such as a tool, bag, or cup that you hold in order to be able to pick up and use the object.

example.ex: The handle of a cricket bat protruded from under his arm.
example.tran: 一个板球拍柄从他的胳肢窝下面伸了出来。

entry.tran: 有能力应付;（成功地）处理
entry.def: If you say that someone can handle a problem or situation, you mean that they have the ability to deal with it successfully.

example.ex: To tell the truth, I don't know if I can handle the job...
example.tran: 说实话，我不知道自己是否能做好这份工作。

entry.def: If you talk about the way that someone handles a problem or situation, you mention whether or not they are successful in achieving the result they want.

example.ex: I think I would handle a meeting with Mr. Siegel very badly...
example.tran: 我觉得和西格尔先生会谈我可能会搞得一团糟。

example.ex: She admitted to herself she didn't know how to handle the problem.
example.tran: 她心里承认自己不知道该如何处理这个问题。

entry.def: If you handle a particular area of work, you have responsibility for it.

example.ex: She handled travel arrangements for the press corps during the presidential campaign...
example.tran: 她负责了总统竞选活动期间新闻报道团的行程安排。

example.ex: The investigation is being handled by Scotland Yard's anti-terrorist branch.
example.tran: 调查由伦敦警察厅反恐部门负责。

entry.tran: 使用，操纵（武器、车辆等）;训练，使唤（动物）
entry.def: When you handle something such as a weapon, vehicle, or animal, you use it or control it, especially by using your hands.

example.ex: I had never handled an automatic.

entry.def: If something such as a vehicle handles well, it is easy to use or control.

example.ex: His ship had handled like a dream!
example.tran: 他的船操纵起来非常灵便。

entry.def: When you handle something, you hold it or move it with your hands.

example.ex: Wear rubber gloves when handling cat litter.
example.tran: 清理猫粪时要带上橡胶手套。

entry.def: If you have a handle on a subject or problem, you have a way of approaching it that helps you to understand it or deal with it.

example.ex: When you have got a handle on your anxiety you can begin to control it.
example.tran: 一旦了解了自己焦虑的原因，你就开始能控制它了。

entry.def: If you fly off the handle, you suddenly and completely lose your temper.

example.ex: He flew off the handle at the slightest thing.
example.tran: 他为一点小事就大发脾气。

means.word_mean: 1. the appendage to an object that is designed to be held in order to use or move it;

sentences.sentence: "he grabbed the hammer by the handle"
"it was an old briefcase but it still had a good grip"

means.word_mean: 1. be in charge of, act on, or dispose of;

sentences.sentence: "I can deal with this crew of workers"
"She managed her parents' affairs after they got too old"

means.word_mean: 3. deal with verbally or in some form of artistic expression;

sentences.sentence: "The course covered all of Western Civilization"
"The new book treats the history of China"

means.word_mean: 4. touch, lift, or hold with the hands;

sentences.sentence: "The prize-winning poodle was handled by Mrs. Priscilla Prescott"

auth_sentence.content: We didn't really handle some areas very well.
auth_sentence.res_content: We didn't really handle some areas very well.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We didn't really handle some areas very well.

auth_sentence.res_content: This can be hard for some parents to handle.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This can be hard for some parents to handle.

auth_sentence.content: I can handle honesty but not leftist talking points.
auth_sentence.res_content: I can handle honesty but not leftist talking points.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 英俊的,慷慨的, 美观的
stems_affixes.word_buile: hand手+some充满……的→adj.英俊的,慷慨的, 美观的
hand手+y……的→手可以拿得到的→方便的
hand手+i=in进入+cap帽→指古代彩票赌马将罚金置于帽中→设置不利条件
hand手+le反复动作或物→n.柄,把手,拉手

stems_affixes.value_cn: 分发的印刷品, 新闻稿
stems_affixes.word_buile: hand手+out出去→用手发出去→分发的印刷品
hand手+i=in进入+cap帽→指古代彩票赌马将罚金置于帽中→设置不利条件

Sentence.sentence: RelayRides and SnapGoods match up owners and renters; smartphones with GPS let people see where the nearest rentable car is parked; social networks provide a way to check up on people and build trust; and online payment systems handle the billing
There are 20 officers in the Campus Security Division Their job is to handle crime, accidents lost and found items ,and traffic problems on campus.
Experienced resident advisors should be assigned to handle the problems.
have difficulty learning to handle the devices
I only heard about the delay yesterday because we kept the production line clear to handle these special sheets.
Inefficient harvesting, inadequate local transportation and poor infrastructure (基础设施)mean that produce is frequently handled inappropriately and stored under unsuitable farm site conditions.

means.word_mean: 处理, 应付, 对待

sentences.en: He refused to allow his secretary to handle confidential letters.
sentences.cn: 他不让秘书处理机密文件。

sentences.en: His wise father knows how to handle him.
sentences.cn: 他聪明的父亲知道如何管教他。

sentences.en: Do you know how to handle the machine?
sentences.cn: 你知道怎样操作这台机器吗?

sentences.en: Wash your hands before you handle my books, please.
sentences.cn: 在拿我的书之前, 请你先洗手。

sentences.en: I have heard that some men handle the culprits roughly, is the problem that serious?
sentences.cn: 我听说有人粗暴地对待犯人，有这么严重吗?

jushi.english: He gave her a handle against him.
jushi.chinese: 他给她造成了可乘之机。

jushi.english: Be sure to take hold of the handle of an ax when you chop things with it.
jushi.chinese: 你用斧头砍东西时,一定要握住斧把。

jushi.english: Blade and handle are the component parts of a knife.
jushi.chinese: 刀身和刀柄是一把刀的组成部分。
